Hey guys!
This is my very first proper gaming mouse! Today i bought a Logitech G402 HYPERION FURY Check it our here : http://gaming.logitech.com/en-au/product/g402-hyperion-fury-fps-gaming-mouse
Should i make a video on my new mouse? I'm not sure, anyway tell me below what mouse you have and if u have the same one say Jynx.
My previous Logitech broke and it wasn't a gaming mouse so....
This mouse is great heaps of functions and buttons on the mouse 9.5/10
Tell me what you think! Matt - Endertait

Nice!

But imo I think the Razer is more ergonomic and better.

That mouse literally put a million buttons in places you cant even touch with your fingers, and Im not a fan of that.

But remember, thats just me, you have another opinion, obviously :P
